tool_description: Wovo Lookup is an API tool that offers WHOIS, DNS, and other lookup functionalities. It empowers developers with quick and easy access to essential domain information, aiding in various web-related tasks with efficiency and accuracy.
name: Wovo Lookup
title: Wovo Lookup

api_list.name: checkDnsRecord

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Accept: A, A6, AAAA, CNAME, MX, NS, PTR, SOA, SRV, NAPTR, TXT

api_list.name: getDnsRecords

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Accept: A, A6, AAAA, CNAME, MX, NS, PTR, SOA, SRV, NAPTR, TXT

api_list.name: whois
